issue.title: [C++] Support concatenation of UnionArrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4975](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4975). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3746 adds support for concatenation of arrays, but UnionArrays are not supported.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4975?focusedCommentId=17448225) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
This should be almost trivial for sparse unions and would require a bit more care for dense unions.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4975?focusedCommentId=17454103) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
